boom noun
(PERIOD OF GROWTH)
[ C or U ] a period of sudden economic growth, especially one that results in a lot of money being made: boom and bust The insurance business suffered from a vicious cycle of boom and bust. the property/real estate boom
[ C usually singular ] an increase in something, or a time when something becomes more popular: This year has seen a boom in book sales. See also
baby boom
